price: Kuma sunã sanyã wa Allah abin da suke ƙi, kuma harsunansu na siffanta ƙarya cẽwa lalle ne sunã da abũbuwa mãsu kyau. Bãbu shakka lalle ne sunã da wuta, kuma lalle sũ, waɗanda ake ƙyãlẽwa ne (a cikinta).
arabic: وَيَجۡعَلُونَ لِلَّهِ مَا يَكۡرَهُونَۚ وَتَصِفُ أَلۡسِنَتُهُمُ ٱلۡكَذِبَ أَنَّ لَهُمُ ٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰۚ لَا جَرَمَ أَنَّ لَهُمُ ٱلنَّارَ وَأَنَّهُم مُّفۡرَطُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
